snippet: Even if you never read the book, you will surely remember the title of Hilary Mantel's upcoming story collection: "The Assassination of Margaret Thatcher."...

headline.print_headline: New Hilary Mantel Book to Be Out in September
headline.main: New Hilary Mantel Book to Be Out in September

lead_paragraph: Even if you never read the book, you will surely remember the title of Hilary Mantel's upcoming story collection: "The Assassination of Margaret Thatcher."
